title: Not getting anymore key fragments
body:
After I got 6 chests, it seems like i'm getting no more key fragments. I've played like 60 games in the past week and got 0 keys. I played with friends in rift and in ARAM, nothing seems to work. This is a new month so the key fragment system should reset itself, still no key fragments. 
How does the system work riot? is it all luck? if so then you should probably change it to a something else like play 4 games get a key, win 4 games get a key, win 8 games get a key, and so on.

replies.body: Rineyy provided some solid information how how key fragments drop.  You'll get a lot at the start, and the rate will slowly go down until it resets roughly every 30 days.  Our [hextech crafting ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide)guide has a lot of information to help with crafting.  Let me know if you have any questions!
Oh so I see, one last question. How can we check when our key monthly thing will reset? what date exactly? is it different for everyone?
There's currently no way to check when the reset is. Exact date varies per account.

The drop rate for key fragments is a curve, not a line. With each fragment you earn, the chance to earn your next one goes down slightly. This number resets roughly every thirty days after you earn your first key fragment.


Riot wanted to give players who didn't play as frequently a good drop rate for keys, without making it feel like farming was mandatory if you wanted keys.



Note: There's currently a bug which prevents you from earning key fragments if you're playing a champion you don't own. This is unintended, and a solution for this is being worked on.
